parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: (a) I receive, get, (b) I take, lay hold of.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A little papyrus roll. A diminutive of biblion; a booklet.
From out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards. A primary preposition denoting origin, from, out.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From aggello; a messenger; especially an 'angel'; by implication, a pastor.
A hand.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To eat up, eat till it is finished, devour, squander, annoy, injure. From kata and esthio; to eat down, i.e. Devour.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Neuter 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
And, even, also, namely.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Sweet. Of uncertain affinity; sweet.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
Honey. Apparently a primary word; honey.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
The mouth, speech, eloquence in speech, the point of a sword.
And, even, also, namely.
When, at which time. From hos and te; at which too, i.e. When.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: A primary verb; to eat.

str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
From koilos; a cavity, i.e. the abdomen; by implication, the matrix; figuratively, the heart.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To make bitter, embitter; pass: I grow angry or harsh. From pikros; to embitter.
